message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SD 

The paper focuses on the use of information retrieval (IR) techniques to improve scholarly information systems, specifically in the context of science modeling. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of digital libraries (cs.DL) and social networks (cs.SI) in scholarly information systems. The paper also touches on the topic of cyberinfrastructure (cs.CY) and the evaluation of retrieval quality, which could fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the structure and dynamics of science, which could fall under the category of scientific computing (cs.SC).
